data: The note 'Server Maintenance Reminder' outlines a scheduled server maintenance window on Saturday between 2 AM and 4 AM UTC.
The note 'Server Maintenance Reminder' directs scheduling of server maintenance during the specified weekend timeframe.
The note 'Server Maintenance Reminder' instructs notification of the server operations team about the upcoming maintenance.
The note 'Server Maintenance Reminder' emphasizes preparation of a rollback plan to address potential deployment failures.
The note 'Server Maintenance Reminder' summarizes the need to plan and communicate the upcoming server maintenance window.
